post.description:
Takes a refresh type JSON web token and returns an access type JSON web
token if the refresh token is valid.

CompanyBasic.description: Basic company serializer for references in other models

CompanyDetail.description: Detailed company serializer for company profile pages

ExperienceLevelEnum.description:
* `entry` - Entry level
* `associate` - Associate
* `mid` - Mid-Senior level
* `director` - Director
* `executive` - Executive

JobApplicationStatusEnum.description:
* `submitted` - Submitted
* `under_review` - Under Review
* `interview_scheduled` - Interview Scheduled
* `interviewed` - Interviewed
* `offer_extended` - Offer Extended
* `hired` - Hired
* `rejected` - Rejected
* `withdrawn` - Withdrawn

JobBasic.description: Lightweight job serializer for use in other serializers

JobCreateUpdate.description: Serializer for creating and updating jobs

JobDetail.description: Detailed serializer for single job view

JobList.description: Serializer for job listings and search results

JobTypeEnum.description:
* `full_time` - Full-time
* `part_time` - Part-time
* `contract` - Contract
* `internship` - Internship
* `temporary` - Temporary
* `volunteer` - Volunteer

NotificationTypeEnum.description:
* `like` - Post Like
* `comment` - Comment
* `share` - Post Share
* `follow` - New Follower
* `mention` - Mention
* `job_application` - Job Application
* `connection_request` - Connection Request
* `post_approved` - Post Approved
* `system` - System Notification

PatchedJobCreateUpdate.description: Serializer for creating and updating jobs

PostTypeEnum.description:
* `text` - Text
* `image` - Image
* `video` - Video
* `article` - Article
* `poll` - Poll
* `job_share` - Job Share
* `achievement` - Achievement

ReactionTypeEnum.description:
* `like` -  Like
* `love` -  Love
* `laugh` -  Laugh
* `wow` -  Wow
* `sad` -  Sad
* `angry` -  Angry
* `celebrate` -  Celebrate
* `support` -  Support

RecommendationTypeEnum.description:
* `mutual_connections` - Mutual Connections
* `same_company` - Same Company
* `same_school` - Same School
* `similar_skills` - Similar Skills
* `location_based` - Location Based
* `industry_based` - Industry Based
* `email_contact` - Email Contact

UserBasic.description: Lightweight user serializer for use in other serializers
